name: mytravel-fullstack
description: Full Stack Travel Booking Application with .NET Core Web API and Angular

scripts.setup: echo Setting up MyTravel Application... && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: echo Setting up Backend... && cd MyTravelAPIServices && dotnet restore && dotnet build
scripts.setup:frontend: echo Setting up Frontend... && cd MyTravelAngular && npm install
scripts.start: echo Starting MyTravel Application... && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.postinstall: echo Run 'npm run setup' to initialize the project

author: Naveen Virat
